The government of UAE has allowed to start limited liability companies (LLC), Service agent, sole establishments of foreign branches / civil companies only with partnership of an Emirati citizen or UAE national. We arrange sponsorship from highly trusted UAE national with responsibility.

We provide exclusive PRO services in Ajman on an annualized basis or on a project basis. This is a specialized service from companies want to hire service for labour, immigration,family visa services, economic and municipality department affairs. By hiring our service companies can save money, time as well as manpower. By choosing our service you can save the expense of employing a full time PRO.

Our area of responsibility include translation and clearing of legal documents accurately with high efficiency. We provide services for online document clearing which include immigration department, labour, economic, municipality, chamber of commerce, ministry on interior, ministry of finance, traffic department, transport department, ministry of health, media council, federal electricity and water authority, ministry of justice (court). We do provide legal translation with high efficiency.

Employers will have to give the ministry of labour and social affairs a sum of Dh3000 as bank guarantee for every new employee they hire. We provide the service to pay bank guarantee in a way that can save your time and return of the same at the time of cancellation of the employee.

We provide full-fledged services for family visa processing in UAE with minimum effort from your side and allows you to welcome your family to UAE in an easy and pleasant way. We can act completely on behalf of you to carry out all your requirements and serve your family visas in UAE. To prepare all the required documents for a new family visa application till you finish the visa stamping for your dependents in UAE.

Accurate bookkeeping is indispensable to unceasing a fighting fit, steady, developing business. While seemingly a simple and menial task, recording all the financial transactions of a company is a central aspect of the corporate accounting process. Our accounting team is well endowed with vat amenable accounting and bookkeeping.
